name: I Know CPR!
description:
A co-op platforming game where one of you controls Yell, who is having a heart attack, while the other controls Pin, who is punching Yell in the chest to keep its heart beating until they can find the defibrillator. Get the right balance of exercise (via Yell's movement) and heart beats (via the numpad) to navigate safely to the end of the level!

Requires 2 players and 1 keyboard (with numpad).

Made in 48 hours in January 2013 for the Global Game Jam
